result.name: northern-powergrid-demand-and-capacity-data
result.notes: Data from Northern Powergrid shows the full area covered by the company and maps demands, fault levels, capacities and generation of substations. Conditions of use included.
result.title: Northern Powergrid - Demand and Capacity Data

resources.name: Northern Powergrid - Demand and Capacity Data
